videogames.title: Videogames app
videogames.description: Web application to explore video games using the RAWG.io API. Users can view, sort, and filter a list of games, as well as add new titles to the database.

ecomics.title: Comics e-commerce
ecomics.description: E-commerce specialized in comic book sales, with shopping cart, card payments, user registration and login, admin panel, and review system for registered users.
